title: User wants to see "Waivers" as a tab on Transactions Dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Transactions" exists as an option in the left nav on the home screen
AND "Waivers" appears as a tab on the Transactions dashboard
AND club(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) or BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) user is logged in with permissions to view Waivers tab
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Waivers"
custom_expected:
THEN 3 accordion sections should be displayed on the page
AND details should match wireframes and data discovery

title: User wants to select a player to submit a Waiver Request for
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or club (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)user is logged in and viewing the "Waivers" tab
AND select2 dropdown to select a player is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks select2 player dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to choose from a list of players from the selected club, who are eligible to have waivers requested
AND eligible players should only include 40-man roster players and any 60 Day DL/60 Day DL Rehab players

title: Club User wants to select a date for a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club user has logged in (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user has navigated to the "Waivers" Request screen from the left nav
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to date picker field on Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN system should load appropriate requests for the default date shown and user's Org
AND system should allow any historical date entry
BUT system should  prevent user from selecting date beyond the default date
AND if different date is selected appropriate requests for that date and Org should be loaded
AND if current time is after 1pm of the request date of the selected bulletin club user should not see an edit button

title: BOC User wants to select a date for a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND user has navigated to the "Waivers" screen from the left nav
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to date picker field on Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN system should load appropriate requests for the default date shown user and selected Org
AND system should allow any historical date entry
AND if different date is selected appropriate requests for that date and Org should be loaded

title: User wants to add multiple players to Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) or BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Request screen
AND the screen is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to click "Add Player" to request waivers on additional players
AND user should be able to request waivers on up to a maximum of 7 players
AND after 7 requests have been made the button should no longer be available

title: Club User wants to submit a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club user has logged in (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user has navigated to the "Waivers" screen from the left nav
AND page is open in edit mode
AND "Submit to BOC" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND if any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user should receive an error message
AND system should refresh the page and sort the players alphabetically
AND system should check for any On Submit rules violations 
AND system should show successful waiver request submission notification and "Submitted On" and "Submitted By" fields are populated
AND these fields should be  updated if request submitted subsequent times
AND system should go back to view mode when complete

title: BOC User wants to submit a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND user has navigated to the "Waivers" screen from the left nav
AND page is open in edit mode
AND "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND if any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user should receive an error message
AND system should refresh the page and sort the players alphabetically
AND system should check for any On Submit rules violations 
AND system should show successful waiver request submission notification and "Submitted On" and "Submitted By" fields are populated
AND these fields should be  updated if request submitted subsequent times
AND system should go back to view mode when complete

title: BOC user wants to save edits to the day's requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND user has navigated to the "Waivers" screen from the left nav
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen on the transactions dashboard
AND user is viewing the day's requests on the widget in Edit mode
AND Save button is available on the form 
BUT "Submit" button is NOT available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and formatting check, as well as all "On Submit" rules for any newly entered players
AND if a new request has been entered for an Org which did not previously have a submitted request, then the "Submitted By" and "Submitted On" fields for that request should be populated
BUT if that Org had at least one prior request for this bulletin then the Submitted information should not be updated
AND once all required fields and rules have passed, the form should reload in View mode, with "Request Entry" section collapsed and "Players with Requested Waivers" section expanded

title: User wants Pending Revocable requests cancelled for player when new Irrevocable request submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user has navigated to Request Entry section of waivers screen
AND user has selected a player from the player dropdown 
AND selected player has REVOCABLE TRD Waiver Request currently on a 'pending' waiver bulletin (result bulletin unsent)
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects an IRREVOCABLE Waiver type (UR, OR) 
AND clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should cancel previously requested Revocable waivers 
AND Request Result should be set to Cancelled in the Claims/Results section of the Waiver Bulletin, as well as on the Waiver History Table on the player's Waivers and Transactions tab on his profile
AND Cancelled Reason should be set to "Irrevocable waivers requested"
AND Waiver Result Status should be set to Cancelled

title: User wants to receive error if they request waivers for player on Inactive List
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) or BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) user is logged in with permission to submit waiver requests
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a player with one of the following roster statuses:
- Military Leave
- Disqualified
- Restricted
- Ineligible
- Deceased
- Suspended
AND clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the [Inactive List Type] list and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested.”
AND clicking back should return user to the form
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: User wants to be able to enter additional fields for a player who wishes to play in foreign league when UR waivers is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_steps: WHEN UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_expected:
THEN "As per release on" field should be displayed with a date picker and time picker
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox should display
AND when “Wishes to play in a foreign league” is checked, a dropdown should appear with a list of available countries that include Japan, Mexico and South Korea
AND a “Cash Consideration Amount” field should be displayed that allows entry of a dollar amount

title: User wants to be shown that they have selected Irrevocable waivers on a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects an "Irrevocable" waiver (OR, UR by default, TRD only if player has previously withdrawn TRD waiver)
custom_expected: THEN "IRREVOCABLE" should display next to Type field

title: User wants to know if player already had waiver request withdrawn during current waiver period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) or BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND user has navigated to the request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player that has already had TRD a waiver request withdrawn (Withdrawal Date populated on profile history) by the same Org during the current waiver period (Trade Waiver Request Period System Date)
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses TRD as Waiver Type
custom_expected: THEN "Irrevocable" should be displayed in orange, next to the "Type" label

title: BOC User wants to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) to view "Waivers" tab
AND "Waivers" is an option on the left nav
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Waivers" tab
custom_expected:
THEN for each request system should display Player Name, Position, MLS, DL (Y/N), DE/Sel (Y/N), Waiver Type, Latest Transaction and date (if one exists in last 30 days), Comments and, for BOC, Request Date, Org and Submitted On date, and Submitted By (username)
AND the layout of the tx should match View mode of provided wireframe
AND fields should match data discovery

title: User wants to remove a Waiver Request before the submission deadline
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Waiver Request screen in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a trash can should be available for each individual player except for UR waivers that have already been submitted 
AND clicking this trash can should remove the individual request entry
AND user should be able to delete non-UR requests even after submission if still before submission deadline

title: Release from Roster tx automatically created for Unconditional Release Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND the request is a UR Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the UR Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN user should be alerted with message "The Release from Roster transaction for <Lastname, Firstname> has been changed to Approved state successfully"
AND Effective Date should be set from the "As Per Release on" date
AND Player's player history should be updated with: Code = URREL Description = Release from Roster, From Org/Club To Org/Club fields to be in black font, To Org/Club fields blank
AND automatically created "As per Release...." comment from waiver request should be saved in the tx
AND player's MJ Roster status should be set to "Released from Roster"
AND system should ensure that a 2nd transaction is not created if set of requests are submitted a 2nd time with UR included

title: User wants to receive error if UR waivers are selected and Release Date is later than current Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) and attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected UR waivers
AND Release Date is later than current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker error “Invalid Date entered for [Last Name], [First Name]’s Release, cannot be after the Current Date.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form

title: User wants to receive error if player has unexpired Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user has navigated to request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player
AND selected player has an unexpired submitted or approved Optional or Trade waiver request
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has an unexpired Trade or Optional Assignment waiver request.”
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with waiver request submission (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if OR waivers are selected and player already secured OR waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected a player that has already secured outright waivers
AND "Outright Waivers Good Until" date on the Player's Profile is later than the Secure Date on the new Request (2 waiver business days after request date)
AND user has selected "OR" waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. You have already secured Outright Waivers for [Last Name], [First Name]. Secured waivers will be effective until [Waiver Expiration Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - BOC - Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) with BOC admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN BOC admin user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view, create, delete, edit, and submit waiver requests for players

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - Club - Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) with Club Admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view, create, delete, submit, and edit all waiver requests for their own players (It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the request)

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - BOC - Basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with BOC basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN BOC basic user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all waiver requests 
BUT user should NOT be able to make any changes

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - Club - Basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Club Basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to view all waiver requests for their own players (It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the request)
BUT user should not be able to make any changes

title: BOC user wants to send a Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen
AND a submitted waiver request bulletin exists for the selected request date
AND it is after 2PM on request date
AND "Send Request Bulletin" button is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should store the current Request Bulletin as it currently exists
AND blue notification should display stating that the request bulletin has been sent successfully
AND screen should be reloaded in View mode, with the Org filter set to "All" and with the "Players with Requested Waivers" section as the only one expanded
AND "Claim" button should appear in the left most column of the Players with Requested Waivers table
AND "Pending" text should be removed from the Bulletin
AND "Results" section should now appear on the form, but collapsed
AND "Resend Notification Emails" button should now be visible

title: User wants to see the most up to date "latest transaction"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user is attempting to create a Waiver Request Entry
custom_steps: WHEN user loads a pending waiver request bulletin (not yet sent)
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for and display the players' latest Approved transaction, even if none was previously displayed or it differs from what was displayed when request was submitted
AND if a user has manually entered a latest transaction for the player, that should NOT be overwritten by any transaction information found by the system. The user's entry should remain
AND refreshing the page should load the latest transactions for the player(s) being viewed
AND when BOC hits "Send Request Bulletin" system should NOT check for the latest transactions, and should capture whatever current entry is and store it along with bulletin information
AND once Bulletin has been sent, system should no longer look for or update any of the list players' Latest Transaction information, but should display whatever value was stored there at the time of the bulletin being sent for the first time (to account for subsequent re-sends of the same bulletin)

title: Club user wants to see Players with Requested Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN a "Players with Requested Waivers" collapsible section should be displayed and expanded by default
AND this section should NOT be visible to Clubs prior to the Bulletin being sent
AND "Players with Requested Waivers" section should match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND "Players with Requested Waivers" section should contain all of the players for whom waivers were requested by all Orgs for the currently selected Request Date
AND the table should be sorted by Org and then by the player's name (Last, First)
AND the "Request Entry" section should be collapsed by default
AND expanding "Request Entry" should display the players that the Club has requested waivers on for the "Request Date" being viewed
AND if no players are found in the Request Entry section, there should be a line of text stating "No Waiver Requests Found"

title: Club user wants to submit a Waiver Claim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user is attempting to Submit a Waiver claim
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN A "Claim" button should be displayed for each player submitted by another Org
BUT no claim  button should display for players from the user's Org
AND no claim button should appear for any club user if after 1:00PM ET on the Claim Expiration Date
AND clicking "Claim" should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to claim waivers on the selected player
AND if user clicks “OK” the system should submit the claim for the club and in place of "claim" button, system should display date and time for which claim was made
BUT if user clicks “Cancel” claim should not be made on player and user should be taken back to claim entry screen
AND once a Waiver Claim has successfully been submitted for a player, the claim information should appear in the "Results" table for the BOC as "Claimed by ORG mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am/pm"

title: BOC User wants to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN a Claim button should be displayed for all players if 'All' is chosen in Org dropdown
BUT if user chooses a specific Org, the Claim button should not appear for players from that Org
AND clicking the Claim button should launch a pop-over that allows the user to select a single Org
AND the player's Org should not appear in the dropdown, nor should any other Orgs that have already submitted a waiver claim for the player
AND clicking “Cancel” should close the popover and take no action
AND selecting an Org and clicking "Claim" should  prompt the user to confirm the claim
AND once user has confirmed they wish to proceed with the claim, modal and popover should be dismissed and user should be returned to "Players with Submitted Requests" table
AND the Claim button should remain for the player
AND if BOC user were to expand the "Results" section of form at this time, they would see "Claimed by ORG date/time" information just as though a Club had performed the Claim
AND if BOC user has entered a Claim on behalf of a club and it is after 1:00PM on the Claim Expiration Date, result should show Claim Expiration Date as mm/dd/yyyy in the result and 12:59 pm as the time in the result

title: BOC User wants to view a properly formatted waiver result including Eligible Org after a waiver claim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND a Waiver Claim has been processed
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Results" section of waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN if only one claim has been entered, it should appear as "Claimed by *ARI 6/10/2016 12:59 " showing Date and time of claim and claiming Org
AND if more than one Org has entered a claim for a player, this should appear as "Claimed by *ARI 6/10/2016 12:59 BAL 6/10/2016 12:59"
AND an asterisk should be used to denote the Org actually eligible to make the claim
AND after eligible Org, following claim Orgs should be displayed in alphabetical order

title: BOC User wants system to determine which Org is eligible when a waiver request has more than one claim entered for it - Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND a Trade Waiver Request has been entered for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the Trade Waiver Request has more than one claim entered for it
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if any of the claiming Orgs are in the same League as Org that entered the Request
AND if there is only one claiming Org in the same League, then that Org should be designated as the Eligible Org
BUT if more than one claiming Org is in the same League, the Orgs NOT in the same League should automatically not be eligible
AND if no Orgs are in the same League as the Org that entered the Request, or if more than one claiming Org is in the same League, then the Eligible Org should be decided based on the lowest winning percentage of the remaining Eligible Orgs
AND if the Claim Expiration Date is within the first 31 days of the season (First Day of MJ Season system date + 30 days), then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the prior season should be considered the Eligible Org
BUT if the Claim Expiration Date is NOT within the first 31 days of the season, then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the current season should be considered the Eligible Org
AND if there is more than one Org that has the lowest percentage, then the system should look to the prior season, and so on until the tie is broken

title: BOC User wants to view Waiver Claim results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND user has selected a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user has selects a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
custom_expected:
THEN the "Results" collapsible section should be available
AND this section should be open by default, with the remaining sections collapsed when the current date is equal to the Claim Period expiration date
AND the Results table should match the provided data discovery and wireframe
AND the Results Bulletin Comments text area should be available and visible per the wireframe

title: User wants sending Waiver Results Bulletin to properly set results for players who have secured waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND Waivers have been requested for a player
BUT these requested waivers do not yet have a result
AND these requested waivers have NOT been claimed or cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN results should be set according to the following criteria:
For UR waivers,result text should be set to "Secured for the purposes of UR".
For TRADE waivers for non-optioned players, result text should be set to  "Secured Through Conclusion of Championship Season"
For all other waivers, result text should be set to "Secured until {Waiver Claim Expiration Date}"

title: User wants to see Transaction Bulletin for requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND UR waivers have been requested for a player
AND these UR waivers have an eligible Org
AND these UR waivers were not cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Result Bulletin is created (the first time ONLY)
custom_expected:
THEN a transaction bulletin should entry should be created for any of these UR waivers
AND description should read - “Player has been claimed on unconditional release waivers by [Eligible Org] and has 5 days to accept or reject assignment.”

title: User wants Waiver Request Result set properly for Waiver Requests that were cancelled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND a Waiver Request has been submitted for a player
AND one or more Orgs have submitted claims on this request
custom_steps: WHEN the Request is Cancelled
custom_expected:
THEN Claim Result should be set to “Cancelled on [cancellation date]”
AND Awarded Flag should be set to 0 for each claim on the request

title: Automatically create a Unconditional Release transaction if UR waivers were requested for a player and no team claimed him
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND a UR waiver request has been submitted for one or more players
AND these request(s) do not have a claiming Org
AND these requests have not been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Results Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN an Unconditional Release transaction should be created by the system and automatically approved if one does not already exist for this player from this Bulletin
AND Transaction Date  should be set to the Current Date
AND Club and Org should be set to request Org 
AND Create, Approved, and Last Changed Date should be set to the current date
AND Waiver Link Transaction ID should be set to requests's Transaction ID 
AND a system should create a non-clickable link in the player’s history
AND system should create entry in Player History (black font), Description = Unconditional Release, Code = UNCRL , From Org/Club
AND system should update player's MJ and MN Roster Status to Free Agent
AND system should Update player's Org and Club to Null
AND transaction should be added to Daily Transaction Bulletin

title: User wants approving UR transaction to terminate player's MJ Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Unconditional Release transaction has been approved for a player as the result of a UR Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN the Unconditional Release Transaction is approved
custom_expected:
THEN status of player's latest Approved or Update Approved MJ Contract should be updated to Terminated
AND  "Terminated on [current date (mm/dd/yyyy)] As Per Unconditional Release” should be appended to comments

title: User wants approving UR transaction to terminate player's MN Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Unconditional Release transaction has been approved for a player as the result of a UR Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN the Unconditional Release Transaction is approved
custom_expected:
THEN status of player's latest Approved or Update Approved MN Contract should be updated to Terminated
AND "Terminated on [current date (mm/dd/yyyy)] As Per Unconditional Release” should be appended to termination comments

title: Club user wants to view Waiver Claim Results
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) and viewing Waivers Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a Request Date for which Results Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN if the Org had at least one submitted request a table should display containing ONLY the players that the Org requested waivers on, and include the Results as displayed on the Waiver Results Bulletin
BUT if the Org did not have at least one submitted request,  the text "No Waivers Requested" should display
AND 'Players Claimed' subsection should be displayed
AND If the Org had at least one player that they entered a claim on - whether or not they were determined to be the "Eligible" Org, the Players Claimed table should display per the wireframe and include only the players that the viewing Org submitted a claim for
BUT if the Org was deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Eligible"
AND if the Org was not deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Not Eligible"
AND  if the Org did not have at least one player that they claimed, then the text "No Players Claimed" should display

title: BOC user wants to view Waiver Claim Results - Before Sending Results Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) and viewing Waivers screen  
AND a Request Bulletin has been generated for a specific Request Date
AND Results Bulletin HAS NOT been sent for that Request Date
AND the "Results" section displays only Cancellation or Claim information for that date
custom_steps: WHEN user sets the "Org" filter in the header to anything other than "All"
custom_expected: THEN Results section should only display the waivers requested by the selected Org

title: Club User wants to see Accept and Reject buttons for player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND the club has requested UR waivers for one or more players
AND the UR waivers have been claimed
BUT the UR waivers have NOT been cancelled 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has not been created for these waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the relevant request date on Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should see split button with Player Accept and Player Reject in the "Player Results" table for these players
AND these options should be available in addition to the "Player Notif." option

title: Club user wants to indicate that player has rejected waiver claim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND the club has requested UR waivers for one or more players
AND the UR waivers have been claimed
BUT the UR waivers have NOT been cancelled 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has not been created for these waivers
AND user sees split button with Player Accept and Player Reject in the "Player Results" table for these players
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Player Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN system should automatically create and submit an Elect Free Agency (Rejection of UR Waiver Claim) Transaction for the associated player
AND "Election Under Article" should be to "Rejection of UR Waiver Claim"
AND Transaction Date should be set to current date
AND system should run all "On Submit" rules, and display any relevant error messages
AND once all On Submit rules pass or are overridden, system should make all Submission Updates

title: Club user wants to see a Create Waiver Claim Assignment button for player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND club has requested REVOCABLE waivers for one or more players
AND the waivers have been claimed
BUT the waivers have not been cancelled
AND current time is before 1:30 PM on Withdrawal Expiration Date
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the relevant Request Date on Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Create Waiver Claim button in the "Player Results" table for these players
BUT this button should not appear after 1:30 PM on Withdrawal Expiration Date

title: BOC user wants to see appropriate button for a player in Results table
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user has logged in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) and viewing Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Player Results" table within "Results" section
custom_expected:
THEN if Waivers have been cancelled for a player, then no button should display
AND if the BOC can only Cancel waivers for the player, then a simple "Cancel" button should be displayed
AND if the BOC can create a player notification, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were not Claimed and not Cancelled)
AND if the BOC can Player Accept or Player Reject, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", "Player Accept", "Player Reject" and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled for which a waiver claim assignment has not yet been created.)
AND if the BOC can Create a Waiver Claim for a player, then a split button should be available with "Create Waiver Claim" and "Cancel" available. (Revocable, claimed requests for which a waiver claim does not already exist)

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) 
AND user has navigated to Waivers Request Entry Screen
AND user has selected a date for which a Request Bulletin has been sent 
AND "Send Result Bulletin" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should store the current Result Bulletin as it currently exists
AND blue notification should display stating that the result bulletin has been sent successfully
AND screen should be reloaded in View mode, with the Org filter set to "All" and with the "Results" as the only section expanded
AND "Edit" button should no longer be available for this Request Date
AND "Claim" buttons should no longer be available for this Request Date for the BOC or for Clubs

title: User wants sending Request Bulletin to appropriately update player's Waiver info on their profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) 
AND TRD, OR or OPT waivers have been requested for one or more players 
AND the relevant Waiver Request Bulletin containing these players has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Waiver information on relevant player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN "In Effect" section should not be updated 
BUT "History" should be updated 
AND request Date, Claim Expiration Date, Requesting Club and Type columns should be populated
BUT remaining columns should be blank

title: User wants sending Results Bulletin to appropriately update player's Waiver info on their profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) 
AND TRD, OR or OPT waivers have been requested for one or more players 
AND the relevant Waiver Request Bulletin containing these players has been sent
AND the relevant Waiver Result Bulletin containing these players has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Waiver information on relevant player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN in the "In Effect" section "Yes" should be populated for players who secured waivers, 
AND "Good Until" date should show their Waiver Expiration Date
BUT "No" should be entered for players who did not secure waivers 
AND "History" should be updated for players that have any Result on the Results Bulletin ("History" should not be updated when request is entered)
AND Secured, Claimed By, and Awarded columns should be populated

title: User wants cancelling Waivers to appropriately update player's Waiver info on their profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND TRD, OR, or OPT waivers have been requested for one or more players
AND those waivers have subsequently been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN user views Waiver information section of relevant player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN "In Effect" section should be updated to say "No"
AND "Good Until" should be cleared if it is populated
AND "History" should be updated
AND Secured should be set to "No"
AND Awarded should be set to "No"
AND Withdrawal Date should be blank
AND Cancelled should be set to the date the Waiver was 
AND Cancellation Reason should be populated with the reason for cancellation (in case of BOC manually cancelling waivers this says “Cancelled by BOC”)

title: User wants to be able to view detailed history of player's waiver activity during their career
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND user has navigated to a Professional Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Waivers" collapsible section on player profile
custom_expected:
THEN  "History" subsection within the "Waivers" collapsible section on the player profile should be displayed and should match the provided wireframe
AND Eligible Org should be shown in the "Claimed By" column
AND if more than one Org has claimed the player for this should display as the Eligible Org with a +
AND on hover over the ORG+ the system should show the additional claiming Orgs

title: User wants to access Waiver Request Date from Waivers section of player profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to view waivers screen
AND user has navigated to the Waiver History section of a Pro Player Profile
AND "Date Requested" column is a hyperlink
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Date Requested"
custom_expected: THEN system should take the user to the Waivers screen with the relevant Request Date selected

title: Waiver Permissions(Player Profile) - Club User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a specific permission has been created to control the visibility of the "Waivers" collapsible section on the Transactions tab
AND this permission has been given to all those with Waivers permissions
AND Club user logs in (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) with this permission
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers Section of Transactions Tab on a Pro Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view the Request Date, Claim Expiration, Requesting Club, Type and Secured information
BUT only Club users that are part of the requesting Org with this permission should be able to view the Claimed By, Awarded, Withdrawal Date, Cancelled and Cancellation Reason information
AND other Clubs should see these columns as blank

title: Waiver Permissions(Player Profile) - BOC User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a specific permission has been created to control the visibility of the "Waivers" collapsible section on the Transactions tab
AND this permission has been given to all those with Waivers permissions
AND BOC user logs in (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) with this permission
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers Section of Transactions Tab on a Pro Player Profile
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view the data for all columns

title: User wants to search for Waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or club(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Advanced Search
custom_expected:
THEN "Waivers" should be added as a Search Type
AND selecting "Waivers" should load Waivers advanced search
AND default filter selection should be "Date" 
AND once one or more filters have been added, the user should be able to run an advanced search and see results per the search requirements

title: User wants to search for Waivers - Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) or BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND logged in user has permission to view the Waivers Screen
AND user has navigated to advanced search screen
custom_steps: WHEN user executes an Advanced Search for Waivers
custom_expected:
THEN BOC users should be able to see all results
BUT Club users should only be able to see:
-All requests that have been included on a Request Bulletin (NO Pending requests)
-All Claims made by their own Org that have been included on a Results Bulletin
-All Claims made by other Orgs on requests they entered that have been included on a Results Bulletin
-All Withdrawals made by their own Org

title: Results Bulletin Email Layout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Results Bulletin has generated with one or more requests and claims entered 
AND valid email is entered on the email utility for users org to receive results bulletin emails
custom_steps: WHEN Club user receives Result Bulletin Email notification
custom_expected:
THEN top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin
Full Club Name (Ex: Los Angeles Dodgers)

The remainder of the email should broken out into two sections. Each section only appears if it is relevant to the Club

The bulletin will display a "Results" section that details the results for any requests that the viewing Org submitted. If none were submitted for this request date, this is not displayed. Format as follows:
Results of request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
Format of each result should be:
Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
{Waiver Result}

If player was not claimed, Waiver Result should match what is displayed on the Results section for BOC (ex: Secured through end of the Championship Season)
If player was claimed, then Claiming information is shown. Eligible Org has . Example:
Claimed by: MIA 8/11/2016 12:58
TB 8/11/2016 12:32
LAA 8/11/2016 12:46
TOR 8/11/2016 12:35
HOU 8/10/2016 16:16
NYY 8/11/2016 12:44

After the Request section, a section should appear detailing the results of any Claims that the Org made, if any. If no claims were made by the Org then this section does not appear. Format as follows:
Results of your claims from request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
{Waiver Claim Result}
Bottom of email should contain -
" ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin *"
AND bulletin should be ordered by Player Name (Last, First)
AND for Clubs, each separate section should be ordered by Player Name

title: Request Bulletin Email Layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a request bulletin has been generated for a Request Date with one or more requests entered
custom_steps: WHEN user (Club or BOC) receives Request Bulletin Email notification
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to what is detailed here: (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/128626185), requests with the same type submitted by the same Org should be grouped under a heading
AND requests should be ordered by waiver type (OR, TRD, UR), Org and then Player Name
AND if a date has no waiver requests, or if a date has no TRD requests, then any bulletin that would be entirely blank will send as "mm/dd/yyyy No Waiver Requests"
AND the body of the No Waiver Request email is blank, and no pdf is attached
AND "Last Tx:" should only be displayed if there is actually a Last Tx populated. 
BUT if there is not a Last tx populated this label should not appear
AND "Comments:" should appear, along with the comments entered for the Waiver Request for those requests that have comments associated. 
BUT if a request does not have a comment entered, the label should not appear

title: User wants PDF of Results Bulletin attached to the email they receive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND email addresses have been entered in Waivers section of email utility for BOC and one or more clubs
custom_steps: WHEN a Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN Waiver Results email received by BOC and Club users entered on email utility should have a PDF of the day's bulletin attached 
BUT if no entries exist, then no attachment should be provided

title: User wants to receive failure notification for all emails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) or Club (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND emails are turned on
AND user has a valid email address entered in the Email Utility with "Send Failure Notification" checked off
custom_steps: WHEN any emails fail being sent
custom_expected:
THEN format of the body of the email should be " Name - Org - <e-mail address> " , using the information populated in the email utility
AND The subject line should be "Error sending <Email Type> Emails"
(example shown in attached story)

title: As a User, I want to edit users on the email utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN Winter League Requests have already been integrated into the email utility
custom_steps: WHEN user with email utility edit permissions navigates to email utility page
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to add users to the utility for Winter League Requests
AND user should be able to remove users from utility for Winter League Requests
AND user should be able to save edits to utility

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) is logged in and attempting to Send a Request Bulletin
AND "Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND "Send Notification" is checked off under "Request Bulletin" for BOC and Club users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification selected
AND All entered waiver requests should be included in this email
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT only OPT, OR and UR waiver requests should be included in that email
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Req Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
     -MLB - Waiver Request Bulletin
     -Bulletin #1003353 Mon 08/15/2016
     -Claim period expires Wed 08/17/2016
AND Format of each request should be:
     -Type - Requesting Org
     -Player Last, Player First Middle Initial. - POS - MLS: 0.000
     -Last TX: (as displayed on bulletin in system)
AND Bottom of email should contain:  "ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin*"

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin to BOC users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) is logged in and attempting to send a Waiver Result Bulletin
AND Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND  "Send Notification" is checked off under "Result Bulletin" for BOC users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for BOC that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification selected. All non-cancelled Waiver Requests will be included
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT this email should be identical to the one generated for "Send Notification", except no TRD requests should be shown
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Res Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
-MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin
-BOC Version (All Clubs) 
AND Format of each result should be:
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (TRD)
-{Waiver Result}
AND if player was not claimed, Waiver Result should match what is displayed on the Results section for BOC (ex: Secured through end of the Championship Season)
AND If player was claimed, then Claiming information is shown. Eligible Org has . Example:
-Claimed by: MIA 8/11/2016 12:58
-TB 8/11/2016 12:32
-LAA 8/11/2016 12:46
-TOR 8/11/2016 12:35
-HOU 8/10/2016 16:16
-NYY 8/11/2016 12:44
(Results of request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016)
AND Bottom of email should contain -
"ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin *"

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin to Club users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) is logged in and attempting to send a Waiver Result Bulletin
AND Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND "Send Notification" is checked off under "Result Bulletin" for Club users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for Clubs that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification selected. All Waiver Requests will be included
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT this email should be identical to the one generated for "Send Notification", except no TRD requests should be shown
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Res Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
-MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin
-Full Club Name (Ex: Los Angeles Dodgers)
AND The remainder of the email should be broken out into two sections. Each section only appears if it is relevant to the Club
AND bulletin should display a "Results" section that details the results for any requests that the viewing Org submitted. If none were submitted for this request date, this should not be displayed. Format as follows:
Results of request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
-Format of each result should be:
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
-{Waiver Result}
AND if player was not claimed, Waiver Result should match what is displayed on the Results section for BOC (ex: Secured through end of the Championship Season)
BUT if player was claimed, then Claiming information should be shown. Eligible Org has . 
Example:
-Claimed by: MIA 8/11/2016 12:58
-TB 8/11/2016 12:32
-LAA 8/11/2016 12:46
-TOR 8/11/2016 12:35
-HOU 8/10/2016 16:16
-NYY 8/11/2016 12:44
AND after the Request section, a section should appear detailing the results of any Claims that the Org made, if any
BUT if no claims were made by the Org then this section does not appear. Format as follows:
Results of your claims from request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
-{Waiver Claim Result}
AND Bottom of email should contain -
"ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin *"

title: BOC user wants to see players in Withdrawal Process section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) is logged in
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user has selects a Request Date, with one or more requests entered, for which the Result Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN "Withdrawal Process" section should display 
AND if it is currently on or after the Withdrawal Period Expiration Date this section should be expanded by default, along with the "Results" section
AND the section should display a table of players that qualify for the withdrawal process per the provided wireframe
AND players that qualify for the withdrawal process should be those with a revocable (TRD) waiver request that has been claimed but not cancelled, and no submitted or approved Waiver Claim Assignment exists for this waiver request
BUT if there is not at least one player to display then the text "No Players Eligible for Withdrawal Process" should appear

title: BOC user wants to execute a Waiver Claim Withdrawal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) is logged in 
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen
AND user has selected a Request Date for which at least one player is displayed in the "Withdrawal Process" section
AND current date is equal to or after Withdrawal Period Expiration Date
AND "Execute Withdrawal Process" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Execute Withdrawal Process"
custom_expected:
THEN system should withdraw the waivers for the players displayed
AND system should set the Waiver Result Status to Withdrawn
AND system should set the Eligible Org’s Claim Result to “Withdrawn on [Withdrawal Expiration Date (mm/dd/yyyy)]”
AND system should set the "Withdrawal" date on the player profile to the Withdrawal Expiration Date

title: User wants to view existing Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) or BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) user is logged in with permissions to advanced search for waivers
AND user has navigated to Advanced Search screen
AND "Waiver Claim Assignment" is an option in Transactions Advanced Search in the "Transaction Type"
custom_steps: WHEN user conducts  an advanced search for "Waiver Claim Assignment"
custom_expected:
THEN system should properly return the results from ebis1
AND clicking on the date should open the associated waiver claim assignment
AND form should match the provided wireframe and data discoveries
AND same behavior should be present in the associated players' player histories

title: Club user doesn't want to see Player Accept/Player Reject after action has been taken on player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) is logged in
AND club user has navigated to waivers screen 
AND user has selected a request date for which results bulletin has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user views the claims/results section
custom_expected:
THEN if Club can Player Accept or Player Reject, then split button should be available with "Player Notif.", "Player Accept", "Player Reject" and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled for which a waiver claim assignment has not yet been created.)
AND once "Player Accept" or "Player Reject" has been selected for a player, BOTH of these options should no longer display for that player

title: WCA automatically created for irrevocable waivers upon sending results bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN non-UR Irrevocable waivers (OR by Default, TRD if player has previously withdrawn TRD waiver) have been requested for one or more players
AND these waivers have been claimed
custom_steps: WHEN Results bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN a waiver claim assignment should be created and submitted to BOC for these players
AND for Outright Waivers, the Waiver Claim Assignment should have a Cash Consideration of $50,000
AND for all waivers, the player should be listed as long as the Cash Consideration and that is it
AND clubs should not be able to manipulate the terms at all in the Submitted to BOC state

title: User wants to create Waiver Claim Assignment - Player Accept
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club(Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE) or BOC(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) user is logged in  
AND waivers have been requested for a player
AND relevant request bulletin has been sent
AND waivers have been claimed by one or more orgs
AND relevant results bulletin has been sent
AND user has navigated to the player table in Claims/results section on waivers screen
AND "Player Accept" is available in a split button next to this player's name
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Player Accept"
custom_expected:
THEN system should create a preliminary waiver claim assignment for the selected player and redirect the user to the transaction
AND Waiver Claim Assignment should have the creating Org's consideration be for the player, and the claiming Org's Cash Consideration = $1
AND  player the waivers were requested for should NOT be able to be removed from the transaction
AND if a preliminary waiver claim assignment already exists for the selected player, the system should redirect the user to the existing waiver claim assignment instead of creating a new one
AND club should have the ability to add additional players and conditions as needed, then the WCA should follow the stateflow of a Trade

title: BOC user wants to approve Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user(test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD) is logged in 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has been submitted for a player
AND BOC user has navigated to the submitted Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all On Approve rule checks that would run on an outright trade
AND once all rule checks pass, the Waiver Claim Assignment should be marked as "Approved"
AND system should Follow all On Approve rules listed for Outright Trades, including:
- Daily Transaction Bulletin entry
- Player History entry
- Auto-Creation of a Recall where applicable
- Roster Status, Club and Player Info updates.
- Clearing of the Approvals item for the BOC and generation of a notification for the involved Clubs
